Servers.genRep

Class DriverInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • Servers.genRep.DriverInfo

  • public class DriverInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that stores the driver information. Used only for logging porposes
    Author:
    Filipe Teixeira , Miguel Azevedo
